page.title: 02Quainton Church
page.content: The church of Holy Cross and Saint Mary stands on the east side of the village. Visitors come to see its monuments and brasses.One of the latter is one of the earliest to depict a woman.Parts of the church date back to 1350. The vicars name is Mr.Hemsley.He has been at Quainton for 10 years.He only spends half his time in Quainton because he works at other village churches as well.He also visits sick people and takes school assemblies.His favourite job is taking family services but he enjoys other services too.He has done 100 christenings since coming to Quainton.Once there were 315 people in the church for a confirmation service taken by the bishop.
